version_description:
1.Added function of displaying friends game status,and you can join your friends' table.
2.Added function of inviting friends to play together.
3.You can observe SNG at the end of match.
4.Optimized the table experience.
5. Fix some bugs.

1. [Characters' Dress Up]: Add 20 sets of costumes to enrich your choices.
2. Optimize other experience issues.

1. [Hand Review ]: You can view more records and quick collections;
2.Optimized login page background.
3.Optimize other experience issues.
